head.description: This page is designed to automatically open the Sport Track Merger app after your Strava login. If you see it, follow the instructions to fix the redirection behavior.

callback.title: 🧭 Did you arrive here by mistake?
callback.description: This page is designed to automatically open the Sport Track Merger app after your Strava login. If you see it, no worries: here’s how to fix it.

reason1.title: 📱 The app is not installed
reason1.text: This is often the simplest reason. To open this page automatically in the app, make sure it is installed on your device.
reason1.button: Try to open the app again
reason1.retryError: Unable to open the app. Please check your installation.

reason2.title: ⚙️ Links are not opening in the app
reason2.text: Even if the app is installed, your device might not yet recognize the links as meant to be opened with Sport Track Merger.
steps: Check that the app is properly installed.
Go to: Settings > Apps > Sport Track Merger > Open by default > Add a link > Enable www.sporttrackmerger.com
